Here's the mpg data set:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(plotly)

mpg %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_classic(lightable_options = "hover") %>% 
  scroll_box(width = "500px", height = "200px")

p <- mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=displ,y=cyl)) +
  geom_smooth() +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p)
  
```
<br><br><br>
The mean cty mpg is `r round(mean(mpg$cty),2)`
